Title: Stone - Carputer Frontend
Description:
Frontend for carputer/carpc written in C#.

It includes:
- Radio
- Gps based on openstreetmaps (www.openstreetmaps.org)
- Bluetooth phone control
- mp3 player
- dix, video player
- skin support
...

Use Visual studio 2008 to give your contribute!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Frontend for carputer/carpc written in C#.

It includes:
- Radio
- Gps based on openstreetmaps (www.openstreetmaps.org)
- Bluetooth phone control
- mp3 player
- dix, video player

Use Visual studio 2008 to give your contribute!

Help us to develop a completely FREE open source frontend for Carputers!

Stone Alpha 9 video preview: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bLm2H99bhOw
